title: Freaky, intense, innovative . . . see it to believe it!
review: Well, they continue to break new ground in the horror genre. I don't know if this film will garner as much dough as Scream or Nightmare on Elm Street, but is just as inventive. In an abysmal pit of badly made horror films, this one has managed to approach the genre from a different angle. See it if it comes to your town!
